title: D&C 29
content: Revelation given through Joseph Smith the Prophet, in the presence of six elders, at Fayette, New York, September 1830. This revelation was given some days prior to the conference, beginning September 26, 1830.
, His coming ushers in the Millennium;
, The Twelve will judge all Israel;
, Signs, plagues, and desolations will precede the Second Coming;
, The last resurrection and final judgment follow the Millennium;
, All things are spiritual unto the Lord;
, The devil and his hosts were cast out of heaven to tempt man;
, The Fall and Atonement bring salvation;
, Little children are redeemed through the Atonement.
